alert.note: Alert for Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 12 at 3:58AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible, with wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow is no longer expected as the weather system bringing that snow is now expected to track to far to the south. Therefore the Winter Storm Watch is cancelled. * WHERE...Simcoe Highlands. * WHEN...From this afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
